def InitializeRow(entity, row): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity
form = row.Grid.ProviderWidget if form == None: return
registro = form.Entity if registro == None: return
if int(registro.Fields["INFOOPERACAO"].Value) == 3: if row.EditCommand != None: row.EditCommand.Visible = False if row.DeleteCommand != None: row.DeleteCommand.Visible = False
